Posts.EditableText: I'm trying to upload my game onto the Quest website, but apparently someone has already uploaded it, and a previous version at that. The user is "Tata". I don't think they meant anything by it, but can I have control of my own game, please?

Posts.EditableText:
I'd probably pm Alex himself directly, as this is a pretty serious issue, and as this thread may not be noticed as quickly, as pming Alex about the problem. Did you share your game code with anyone? How does this 'tata' have not only your final game, but also your older versions of it as well... ??? !!!
